feature.label: Rioko Utilities Feature
feature.description:
This feature include all the Eclipse plug-ins with different classes and utilities for Java programming.
It gives access to: - An abstract implementation of a graph using adjacency lists. - Graph searching iteratos as the breath Search. - Some Zest utilities - A Copiable interface - A Log system - A Time measure system for performance testing. - Some collections implementations: * A FIFO Set. * A Map which iterates over it keys in the same order they have been added. - A implementation of Set basic operation (union, intersection, symmetric difference, etc.)
feature.license: Use this software freely but, whenever use it, make a reference to its creator and distributor.
